## bonk

A cue-based configuration build system.

```
bonk [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -j, --concurrency uint   The number of goroutines to run (default 100)
  -c, --config string      config file (default is .bonk.yaml)
  -h, --help               help for bonk
```
